title: HorizontalVerticalDiagonal
extract: A diagonal is made out of a straight line that's set at an angle instead of straight up or across. If you picture a square and draw a line connecting the opposite corners, that's a diagonal line. You'll find diagonal lines in geometry, and also in the world around you.
extract_html: A diagonal is made out of a straight line that's set at an angle instead of straight up or across. If you picture a square and draw a line connecting the opposite corners, that's a diagonal line. You'll find diagonal lines in geometry, and also in the world around you.
